import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import './Cards.css'; import CardItem from './CardItem'; function CatagorizedCards() { const menClothes = useRef(null); const womenClothes = useRef(null) const babiesClothes = useRef(null) const gotoSpecificSection = () => window.scrollTo({ top: babiesClothes.current.offsetTop, behavior:"smooth" }) return ( <>

Men Cloths

Women Cloths

Babies Cloths

); } export default CatagorizedCards;
